EmailTemplate.description: Email notification template sent to an outlet on submission of their case by the Retail Fulfilment Call Centre (RFCC)
EmailTemplate.name: RFCC Escalation Email to Team Leader
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.CaseNumber} Action Required – SLA has been breached
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Team Leader,
Action Required – SLA has been breached
Attention Retail Fulfilment Call Centre Team Leader
Salesforce case reference number {!Case.CaseNumber} has passed its SLA of 48 hours since creation and immediate action is required to resolve this query.
{!Case.Thread_Id}
